content:
Hi All,
How to link up Practitioner data into Organization??Can anyone suggest me.
Thanks in Advance.
Check out the PractitionerRole resource, that's what it is for.
(through locations too, and has capacity for availability info too)
@rekha did you have further questions?
Hi @Lloyd McKenzie I didn't find solutionfor this:-"How to link up Practitioner data into Organization??"
As has been pointed out, PractitionerRole is the normal way to establish that linkage. How is it not working for you?
